channel.title: Wordle Spoiler
channel.copyright: Copyright 2026 Abby Manock and Casey Opstad
channel.itunes:subtitle: A podcast about spelling, language, and games
channel.itunes:author: Abby Manock and Casey Opstad
channel.itunes:summary: WORDLE SPOILER is a recap, review and in-depth analysis of the daily Wordle experience. WARNING: Do not listen to this podcast if you haven't done your Wordle yet today! WE WILL SPOIL IT!
channel.description: WORDLE SPOILER is a recap, review and in-depth analysis of the daily Wordle experience. WARNING: Do not listen to this podcast if you haven't done your Wordle yet today! WE WILL SPOIL IT!
